channel.title: tidytuesday on Dripping Data
channel.description: Recent content in tidytuesday on Dripping Data

item.title: Password Strength and Tidy Tuesday
item.description: I just found out about Tidy Tuesday, an educational exercise from the R for Data Science folks. The idea is that they publish a dataset every Tuesday for people to play around with. If you make something you’re proud of you can publish it on Twitter and use the hashtag #tidytuesday. I haven’t tried it before, but today’s one was a topic that was of interest to me–computer security and passwords.
